text: Lori Tan Chinn (born 7 July 1948) is an American actor. She is best known for her role as Mei Chang on the Netflix series Orange Is the New Black. Chinn's first acting role was Miss Higa Jiga in Lovely Ladies, Kind Gentlemen (1970) on Broadway. ==Early life== Chinn was born in Seattle, Washington. She is of Hoisan, Chinese descent. Chinn moved to New York City by herself when she was eighteen years old. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
